details.point: Implemented real-time localization and piece detection computer vision systems for three large-scale, 125lb competition robots.
Designed and led the fabrication of numerous robot components, applying advanced techniques in both additive manufacturing (TPU, PETG, PLA 3D printing) and sheet metal construction.
Brought the team to top 0.1% international ranking (5/3,500+ teams) in 2024.
Developed data collection infrastructure powering 200+ users to analyze 1000+ competition matches.
